video.title: Monumental Mysteries Collection
video.synopsis: Host Don Wildman travels across America searching for its most fascinating monuments, stunning statues, amazing memorials and iconic national parks.

episodes.synopsis: Don relates the stories behind a young woman suspected of haunting her family, a notorious New York con man and the country's most infamous prison.
episodes.title: Teen Vampire, King of Cons, First Escape from Alcatraz

episodes.synopsis: Don examines strange imagery in Grand Central Terminal, a haunted Charleston prison and a heroic episode in the life of the father of modern surfing.
episodes.title: Grand Central Occult, Superhero Surfer, Charleston Jail

episodes.synopsis: Don reveals the bitter rivalry that led to the creation of an iconic skyscraper and how a Hollywood legend made a valuable technological contribution.
episodes.title: Chrysler Building, Stanford Mausoleum, Hedy Lamarr

episodes.synopsis: Don visits a memorial to a fictional boxer, the tombstone of a murdered dentist and a monument immortalizing an iconic moment of public affection.
episodes.title: The Real Rocky, Dr. Burdell, Kissing Sailor

episodes.synopsis: Don visits the grave of a mysterious psychic and the bust of a great composer, and explores a city park with a haunted past that inspired a movie.
episodes.title: Sleeping Prophet, Mysterious Death of Mozart, The Real Poltergeist

episodes.synopsis: Don visits the spot where a famous guitarist supposedly made a devilish deal and explores an Alaskan national forest where two congressmen vanished.
episodes.title: Devil's Music, Fisherman's Wharf, Alaska Triangle Hale Boggs

episodes.synopsis: Don's itinerary includes a monument to the first circus elephant, a haunting tombstone and a statue dedicated to an explorer who met a violent end.
episodes.title: First Circus Elephant, Greenbrier Ghost, Death of Captain Cook

episodes.synopsis: Don examines the tragic and notorious stories behind a monument commemorating a love story and an island nicknamed for a California serial killer.
episodes.title: Ames Pyramid, Straus Titanic, Cracking the Zodiac

episodes.synopsis: Don inspects a sculpture that commemorates an otherworldly event, a tiny Texas skyscraper and an engineering wonder inspired by a would-be emperor.
episodes.title: Kecksburg Space Acorn, Skyscraper Swindle, Emperor of the US

episodes.synopsis: Don investigates the statue of a saint with a dubious past, a fortress with a strange tale of secrecy and spectacular caverns that are home to bats.
episodes.title: St. Urho, Mystery Castle, Bat Bombs

episodes.synopsis: Don visits a majestic elephant with an incredible tale of survival, a landmark that was bombed in 1915 and an abandoned camp with a sinister past.
episodes.title: Lucy the Elephant, Capitol Bomber, Hitler in Hollywood

episodes.synopsis: Don investigates the home of a dancer who had an affair with a king, a giant statue of Vladimir Lenin and a disease studied by a dedicated scientist.
episodes.title: The King and the Spanish Dancer, A Communist Comes to America, Filth Party

episodes.synopsis: Don relates the stories of a controversial California scientist, a hoax involving footprints and how an astronomer changed our perception of life.
episodes.title: The Reanimator, Florida Three Toes, The Man Who Invented Martians

episodes.synopsis: Visit a Boston home involved in an audacious escape from slavery, an oak tree linked to tales of witchcraft and the amazing Holmdel Horn Antenna.
episodes.title: Escape from Slavery, A Witch on Hatteras Island, The Horn That Made a Big Bang

episodes.synopsis: Don explores a battleship linked to tales of conspiracy, examines a marker saluting a boxing match and investigates the first spy ring in the U.S.
episodes.title: Roosevelt's Moroccan Mission, The Last Bare Knuckle Boxer, America's First Spy Ring
